trans-unit.source: A job that performs an action on a users account, that matches a set of conditions.

Bodytext of the e-mail being sent to a user. The following tags will be automatically replaced with personalised content. ###NAME### with the users name, ###LINK### with the link tag to extend, ###URI### with (only) the extend link, ###GROUPNAMES### with the name of an expiring group (Only for "Group expires within")
